class.name: TrainLoad
class.brief_description: A class that manages cargo loading and unloading operations for train cars.
class.description:
TrainLoad class handles the loading and unloading operations for train cars. It provides functionality to manage cargo transfer speeds, load capacity, and different types of cargo units (tons or pieces). The class includes overload protection and supports various loading configurations through a list of load items.
Example usage: [codeblock] var train_load = TrainLoad.new() train_load.max_load = 50.0 train_load.load_unit = TrainLoad.LOAD_UNIT_TONS train_load.load_speed = 2.0 train_load.current_load = 25.0 # Load 25 tons of cargo [/codeblock]
